patthana24.13:1.1_0: Nasārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi,
patthana24.13:1.1_1: adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.13:2.1_0: Naanārammaṇaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
